front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for SCTE

abstract.t: This document describers the Namespace Identifier (NID) 'scte' for Uniform Resource Names (URNs) used to identify resources published by the Society of Cable Telecommunications Engineers (SCTE). SCTE specifies and manages resources that utilize this URN identification model. Management activities for these and other resource types are handled by the SCTE.
